title: these boards are trash
body: Catering to brown noses,league of legends white knights and tons of bias people who dont play the game but comment on every comment . not to mention the mods who work for free and sit here all day to defend a bad system and a trashcan company.  suck more ! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: You must think the boards are useful to some extent considering you continue to post here...

They SHOULD BE.

OP is right and after trying for months I realise that these boards are literally controlled as OP said. I haven't been silenced much because I followed the stupid silver draconian standards of politeness, seeing reasonable people get booed hissed and silenced because they had a strong stance against the punishment system, while allowing outright poison against victims of the system.

Its wrong and I'm mad about these SJWs, witch hunters and white knights

I told riot.
Other people will realize one day.

feels good to see people stand up and be counted. :)
